description.lang: Motion Detection.ZP 3102 Z-Wave Motion Sensor Features:*Passive Infrared Sensor (PIR)*2~10 meter Motion Range *120o Horizontal Angle Coverage*Low battery detection*Tamper Switch*Z-Wave 5.02 SDK*100ft line of sight*LED Status Indicator*Operating temp: -15oC~40oC*Working Voltage: 3V*Dimensions: 84*62*50mm

deviceDescription.productName: PIR Motion Sensor - Vision Wireless PIR Sensor. -- EU Version
